elara_kess.name: Elara Kess
elara_kess.backstory: Under-city tinkerer who fights corporate erasure by splicing illicit circuits to steal back power and memories.
elara_kess.notes: Personal anchor: reversed lullaby; excellent at hardware bypass and stealthy repairs.

polkin_rishall.name: Polkin Rishall
polkin_rishall.backstory: Former internal auditor turned covert ally; uses Auditor tools and salvaged failsafes to defend the undercity and preserve memories.
polkin_rishall.notes: Has an implanted soldering tool (cybernetic hand). Keeps a list of lost names; high resilience against Kaznak corruption.
